abstract: Wells Fargo‘s $2.55 billion fourth-quarter loss on Wednesday is the first sign that its hurried acquisition of the troubled Wachovia Corporation would be a long and difficult struggle.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo‘s $2.55 billion fourth-quarter loss on Wednesday is the first sign that its hurried acquisition of the troubled Wachovia Corporation would be a long and difficult struggle.

headline.main: Wachovia Acquisition Drags Down Wells Fargo
